vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Access Control due to improper access control mechanisms. Attackers who are Access List Owners can escalate their privileges by assigning arbitrary permissions, including to themselves, which could lead to a complete compromise of the system.
